lead_paragraph: Ms. von Stade plays the ornery, bigoted, faded Southern belle at the center of “A Coffin in Egypt” at Jazz at Lincoln Center.

headline.print_headline: A Grande Dame’s Lurid Past Laid Bare in One Act
headline.main: Review: Frederica von Stade, Wickedness in a One-Act Opera

snippet: Ms. von Stade plays the ornery, bigoted, faded Southern belle at the center of “A Coffin in Egypt” at Jazz at Lincoln Center.
abstract: Zachary Woolfe reviews concert performance of Ricky Ian Gordon and Leonard Foglia opera A Coffin in Egypt, perstarring mezzo-soprano Frederica von Stade, at Jazz at Lincoln Center.
